uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.model.data.filter

Class Joiner<T extends DataObject,BDO extends DataObject>

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.jdbc.filter.FilterSet<T>
      • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.jdbc.filter.BaseCombineFilter<T>
        • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.jdbc.filter.BaseSQLCombineFilter<T>
          • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.jdbc.filter.SQLAndFilter<BDO>
            • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.model.data.filter.Joiner<T,BDO>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - remote table type
    BDO - target table type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    BaseFilter<BDO>, BaseSQLFilter<BDO>, BinaryFilter<BDO>, JoinFilter<BDO>, OrderFilter<BDO>, PatternFilter<BDO>, SQLFilter<BDO>, Targetted<BDO>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DataObjectFactory.DestFilter, DataObjectFactory.RemoteFilter

    public class Joiner<T extends DataObject,BDO extends DataObject>
extends SQLAndFilter<BDO>
implements JoinFilter<BDO>
    Filter to join two tables, selecting entries based on a filter on the remote table
    Author:
    spb
